name: Maurice SHOATZ, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of PA., Tom Wolf, Governor, Commonwealth of PA Dept. of Corrections, John E. Wetzel, Secretary, Appellees

parties: Maurice SHOATZ, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of PA., Tom Wolf, Governor, Commonwealth of PA Dept. of Corrections, John E. Wetzel, Secretary, Appellees

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 22ni1 day of February, 2017, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

attorneys: Hugh J. Burns, Jr,, Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, Philadelphia, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, appellee.
Chase M. Defelice, Mechanicsburg, for Department of Corrections, John E. Wetzel, Tom Wolf, appellees.
Theron Richard Perez, Mechanicsburg, for Department of Corrections and John E. Wetzel, appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
154 A.3d 764
Maurice SHOATZ, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of PA., Tom Wolf, Governor, Commonwealth of PA Dept. of Corrections, John E. Wetzel, Secretary, Appellees
No. 33 EAP 2016
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
February 22, 2017
Maurice Shoatz, Pro Se.
Hugh J. Burns, Jr,, Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, Philadelphia, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, appellee.

Theron Richard Perez, Mechanicsburg, for Department of Corrections and John E. Wetzel, appellees.
